name: Toxic Pizza
description:
TOXIC PIZZA (PLEASE PLAY ONLINE)
(TO AVOID ERRORS)
Feed these zombie animals with a toxic pizza to keep them out of your land.
1- This game have a leaderboard.
first leaderboard is of total score player made
and another of highest score a player scored

2- we have also putted a nice music in this game.
3-We had tried to make it a addictive game.
Thankyou . 

This game is still in a development stage.


hope you like it.
